catalog_script_client.name: prevent borrow

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_21dbe90c974751103e1f7cb0f053afbb
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Borrow Books">7b79aed0976611103e1f7cb0f053af1e</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>prevent borrow</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	var patron = new GlideAjax('Limits');
	patron.addParam('sysparm_name','PatronTotal');
	patron.getXML(populateListField2);

	function populateListField2(response){
		var answer2 = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		if(answer2>=2){
// 			alert("Cannot borrow more books. Please settle your overdue fee of $" +answer2+ ".\nSubmit button will be hidden until then.");
			g_form.setMandatory('borrowed_book', false);
			g_form.setVisible('borrowed_book', false);
			g_form.addErrorMessage("Cannot borrow more books. Please settle your overdue fee of $" +answer2+ ".\nSubmit button will be hidden until then.");
		}
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-11-04 02:56:07</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>21dbe90c974751103e1f7cb0f053afbb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>prevent borrow</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Library Management System" source="x_898711_library_m">bf42c94f971211103e1f7cb0f053af8b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Library Management System">bf42c94f971211103e1f7cb0f053af8b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_21dbe90c974751103e1f7cb0f053afbb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-04 02:56:27</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
